title: Write SQL
description: Write into a SQL-compatible data store

business_keys.title: business keys to use for upsert in case of an UPSERT

items.description: The business key is used for performing an upsert in case the load strategy is UPSERT
items.title: name of column

mapping.title: The columns mapping of source to target
mapping.description: A list of columns to use for loading into the target table. If ommitted, will use the table's column names and the dataframe's column names.

source.title: source column name or expression. Any valid SQL expression can be used

target.title: target column name
target.description: optional. if ommitted, source column and target column will be identical

connection.title: The connection to use for loading
connection.description: Logical connection name as defined in the connections.yaml

table_schema.title: The table schema of the target table
table_schema.description: If left blank, the default schema of this connection will be used as defined in the connections.yaml

active_record_indicator.description: used for `TYPE2` load_strategy. An SQL expression used to identify which rows are active

inactive_record_mapping.title: used for `TYPE2` load_strategy. The columns mapping to use to close out an active record
inactive_record_mapping.description: A list of columns to use. Use any valid SQL expression for the source. If 'target' is ommitted, will default to the name of the source column

source.title: source column name or expression. Any valid SQL expression can be used

target.title: target column name
target.description: optional. if ommitted, source column and target column will be identical
